roleset.name: (cause to) be affected with a certain attribute

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: ... with a sense of release-1 tinged *trace*-1 with trepidation.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'color' based on sentences in ectb2; adjectival 'tinged' found in medi-seedcorpus. Member of VNcls fill-9.8. Comparison to Verbnet entry 24. frameset created by Jena

example.name: adjectival rel: tinged
example.text: Serial sectioning demonstrates a single apparent lymph node which-1 [*-1] is largely fat - replaced and focally blue - tinged .
